title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

what: An R Implementation of the INTERGROWTH-21st Standards and Tools
title: An R Implementation of the INTERGROWTH-21st Standards and Tools
text: INTERGROWTH-21st Project multi-centre, multi-ethnic, population-based project, conducted 2009 2014, eight demarcated urban areas: Pelotas, Brazil; Shunyi County, Beijing, China; Central Nagpur, India; Turin, Italy; Parklands Suburb, Nairobi, Kenya; Muscat, Oman; Oxford, UK, Seattle, USA. primary aim study growth, health, nutrition neuro-development less 14 weeks gestation 2 years age, using conceptual framework Multicentre Growth Reference Study, produce international prescriptive standards pregnancy dating, maternal weight gain, fetal growth, newborn size, postnatal growth preterm infants cognitive development 2 years age. scientifically robust clinical tools may used monitor evaluate maternal fetal well-, well infant health nutrition individual population level.

title: An R Implementation of the INTERGROWTH-21st Standards and Tools
text: intergrowth package active development yet CRAN. can install development version GitHub :

title: An R Implementation of the INTERGROWTH-21st Standards and Tools
text: intergrowth package provides functions calculate various anthropometric indices young children (less 14 weeks 2 years old) based calculations prescribed INTERGROWTH-21st Project.

title: An R Implementation of the INTERGROWTH-21st Standards and Tools

what:
The INTERGROWTH-21st Project is a multi-centre, multi-ethnic,
population-based project, conducted between 2009 and 2014, in eight
demarcated urban areas: Pelotas, Brazil; Shunyi County, Beijing, China;
Central Nagpur, India; Turin, Italy; Parklands Suburb, Nairobi, Kenya;
Muscat, Oman; Oxford, UK, and Seattle, USA. Its primary aim was to study
growth, health, nutrition and neuro-development from less than 14 weeks of
gestation to 2 years of age, using the same conceptual framework as the WHO
Multicentre Growth Reference Study, so as to produce international
prescriptive standards for pregnancy dating, maternal weight gain, fetal
growth, newborn size, the postnatal growth of preterm infants and cognitive
development at 2 years of age. These scientifically robust clinical tools
may be used to monitor and evaluate maternal and fetal well-being, as well as
infant health and nutrition at an individual and population level. — intergrowth
